name: Units.mem_posSubgroup
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemiring R
u : Units R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Units.posSubgroup R) u) (LT.lt 0 ↑u)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem Units.mem_posSubgroup {R : Type*} [LinearOrderedSemiring R] (u : Rˣ) :
    u ∈ Units.posSubgroup R ↔ (0 : R) < u :=
  Iff.rfl
